bibl.title: Demotic Ostraca in Amsterdam.
bibl.note: Collection of ostraca acquired by P.J. SIJPESTEIJN for the University of Amsterdam around 1969 (since 2003 in the Allard Pierson Museum). The Greek ostraca were published in O. Amst. - See pp. 55-58 and pl. 29: II. Receipt (Text 3). Demotic letter receipt followed by a Greek witness subscription, originally published separately by: P.J. SIJPESTEIJN, More Remarks on Some Imperial Titles in the Papyri, ZPE 49 (1982) p. 97 (= S.B. XVI, 12995). Thebes?, 24 March 30 AD.
